GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.152
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: Clean up si_domain in the init_dmars() error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.152 by commit d74196bb278b8f8af88e16bd595997dfa3d6fdb0, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 86080ccc223aabf8d0b85a504f4f06aa88e82fb3. For more details please see the references link.
